input_text:
Job Title: Warehouse Associate - 3rd Shift (Sunday- Thursday) Waco, TX Distribution Center

Location: Waco, TX

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Career Area: 

Operations

 Job Description: 

 Your Work Shapes the World at Caterpillar Inc. 

When you join Caterpillar, you're joining a global team who cares not just about the work we do – but also about each other. We are the makers, problem solvers, and future world builders who are creating stronger, more sustainable communities. We don't just talk about progress and innovation here – we make it happen, with our customers, where we work and live. Together, we are building a better world, so we can all enjoy living in it.

Job Description

 Location: Caterpillar Distribution Center - 2901 Gateway Blvd, Waco, TX 76712 

 Compensation And Benefits: 

 Starting wage is $18.00/hour (paid weekly) for third shifts Overtime opportunities available at 1.5x pay rate Medical, dental, vision and prescription benefits starting day 1 6% company match for 401k Quarterly bonus 2 weeks paid vacation, paid holidays, and paid sick time Employee Assistance Programs providing financial advice, personal and group therapy, etc.

Great earning potential! If you are career oriented with a strong work ethic, Caterpillar is the place for you!

 Shifts Available: 

 3rd Shift: Sunday - Thursday 10:00pm-6:30am ($18.00/hour) 

 Your Work Shapes the World 

When you join Caterpillar, you are joining a team of makers, innovators and doers. We are the people who roll up our sleeves and do the work to build a better world. We don’t just talk about progress and innovation. We make it happen. And we are proud of that, because it helps our customers build and power the world we live in – the roads, hospitals, homes and infrastructure. Without a dedicated workforce Caterpillar could not effectively meet our customer’s needs. Join us.

As a Warehouse Associate at Caterpillar Inc., you will work from a variety of source documents to verify part numbers, part locations and quantities. In addition to counting parts and filling orders, you will conduct first line, basic quality assessment of parts for damage and defects.

 Description 

Warehouse Associates perform a wide variety of tasks, including utilizing heavy equipment, reach trucks, forklifts and overhead cranes. They perform many material handling and warehouse functions including order filling, processing, storing/picking parts, materials and supplies. They also may operate automated packaging equipment, paint line operation and shipping and receiving.

 Basic Qualifications 

 1 year continuous employment with a previous or current job  Experience working with written instructions for a given task (standard work/operating procedures)  Basic experience with computers (capable of functioning independently) 

 Top Candidates Will Also Have: 

Must be willing to operate all kinds of mobile equipment (Reach Truck, Order Picker, and Forklift).

 Additional Information 

Equipment experience preferred.

Basic computer/tablet knowledge preferred.

Base Pay for this position is $18.00/HR

3rd shift receive $1.00/HR shift premium ($19.00/HR)

 Employee benefit details 

Our goal at Caterpillar is for you to have a rewarding career. Our teams are critical to the success of our customers who build a better world.

Here you earn more than just an hourly wage, because we value your performance, we offer a total rewards package that provides day one benefits (medical, dental, vision, RX, and 401K)

Additional benefits include paid vacation days and paid holidays (prorated based upon hire date).

 Final details 

Please frequently check the email associated with your application, including the junk/spam folder, as this is the primary correspondence method. If you wish to know the status of your application – please use the candidate log-in on our career website as it will reflect any updates to your status.

This employer is not currently hiring foreign national applicants that require or will require sponsorship tied to a specific employer, such as H, L, TN, F, J, E, O. As a global company, Caterpillar offers many job opportunities outside of the U.S. which can be found through our employment website at www.Caterpillar.com/Careers

Visa Sponsorship is not available for this position. This employer is not currently hiring foreign national applicants that require or will require sponsorship tied to a specific employer, such as, H, L, TN, F, J, E, O. As a global company, Caterpillar offers many job opportunities outside of the U.S which can be found through our employment website at www.caterpillar.com/careers.

 Posting Dates: 

April 15, 2024 - May 30, 2024

Any offer of employment is conditioned upon the successful completion of a drug screen.

EEO/AA Employer. All qualified individuals - Including minorities, females, veterans and individuals with disabilities - are encouraged to apply.

Not ready to apply? Join our Talent Community .

Experience Level (if available): None
